resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104065</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104065</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202582</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tableaux Tour of Texts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzeichnis-Tour der Texte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Excursion de tableaux des textes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excursão dos quadros dos textos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro dei tableaux dei testi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γύρος εικόνων των κειμένων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viaje de los cuadros de textos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students express their empathy for characters and events from books read in small groups by creating tableaux (freeze-frames) of key scenes to present to the class.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer drücken ihr empathy für Zeichen 
und Fälle von den Büchern gelesene innen kleine Gruppen aus, indem 
sie Verzeichnisse (Einfrierenfelder) der Schlüsselszenen zum 
Geschenk zur Kategorie erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants expriment leur empathie pour des
caractères et des événements des livres dedans lus de petits 
groupes en créant des tableaux (geler-trames) des scènes 
principales au présent à la classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes expressam seu empathy para 
caráteres e eventos dos livros grupos pequenos dentro lidos criando 
quadros (congel-frames) das cenas chaves ao presente à classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi esprimono il loro empathy per i 
caratteri e gli eventi dai libri piccoli gruppi dentro colti creando i
tableaux (congel-strutture) delle scene chiave al presente al codice 
categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές εκφράζουν το ενσυναίσθημά τους για τους 
χαρακτήρες και τα γεγονότα από τα βιβλία που διαβάζονται στις 
μικρές ομάδες με τη δημιουργία των εικόνων (freeze-frames) των 
βασικών σκηνών που παρουσιάζουν στην κλάση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes expresan su empathy para los 
caracteres y los acontecimientos de los libros adentro leídos los 
grupos pequeños creando los cuadros (congelar-marcos) de las escenas 
dominantes al presente a la clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KIM BOWEN
FN:KIM BOWEN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202582</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104065</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tableaux-tour-of-texts</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
